title: Check if a vehicle model has been recalled

details.description: Check online if a vehicle make or model has been recalled because of a fault in manufacturing
details.more_information:
You’ll need to know the vehicle’s:

  • manufacturer
  • model
  • date of manufacture
details.introduction: If a fault is discovered in a vehicle make or model after manufacturing it might be recalled. To find out if a vehicle has been recalled you can check online.
details.will_continue_on: the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) website

details.description: Includes disqualification, penalty points, vehicle recalls and registering boats

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
